alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains West; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 4:17PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hot Springs, northwestern Natrona, northeastern Fremont and southeastern Washakie Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 417 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lost Cabin, or 30 miles east of Shoshoni, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cottonwood Pass around 435 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains West; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains
